summary: This mod IS ABSOLUTeLY AWESOME, adds a follower with the power of a dragon and the shouts, spell of a dragon..... AAANND A Ghostly DEATHLY weapon.....
descriptionHtml:
-----------------------------------MOD-----------------------------------

This mods adds a follower with a cool, nice armor.

He uses the shouts and spells of a dragon, and a powerfull Healing spell.

Shouts (Unarm, FireBreath {LOOKS AWESOME!!!})
Spell ( healing )
Weapons (overpowered weapon mod {by me})
I made the weapon invisible so he looks more A$$A$$IN

-----------------------------------WHERE??????!?!?!-----------------------------------

In Riverwood, in the Riverwood\'s trader

-----------------------------------FOLLOWER-----------------------------------

The follower itself is a Imperial with a Orc voice, He Can SOMETIMES make cow noises!

The follower is a male that will fight to the death of his master(you)
Hes a nice guy, shure he will like you too!
BTW his short name is A$$ :D

-----------------------------------HOW TO INSTALL-----------------------------------

Download with manager or manual, 

If manual, Open the ZIP and unZIP it, And put the .ESP file in your Skyrim Data folder,
(most of the time C:\\Program Files (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data)


-----------------------------------CREDIT-----------------------------------

G0Dx For making the mod
Jake( XBOX = BlackxLeggendzZ) for the idea\'s

AND YOU GUYS FOR THE SUPPORT!!
author: G0Dx
